import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import ApiRequest from "src/Api/Data/requestApi"; const SingeleTask=({id,closeTask,isAccept=true})=>{ //alert(id); const [details,setDetails] = useState([]); const [view,setView] = useState(false); const getDetails=async()=>{ const result = await ApiRequest.getSingleTaskFullDetails(id); setDetails(result.data); console.log(result.data); setView(true); } const statusMode=(status)=>{ if(status === "new"){ return {status} } if(status === "cancelled"){ return {status} } if(status === "completed"){ return {status} } if(status === "in-progress"){ return {status} } } useEffect(()=>{ getDetails(); },[]); return <> {view &&
ORDER DETAILS  ({details.result[0].task_title})
click here to go back {"->"} 
Order Status   {statusMode(details.result[0].task_status)}
Order Name

{details.result[0].task_title}

Order ID

{details.result[0].task_id}

Order Title

{details.result[0].task_title}

Work Type

{details.result[0].task_work_type}

Service

{details.result[0].task_service}

Discipline

{details.result[0].task_Descipline}

Created date

{details.result[0].task_created_date}

DEADLINE

{details.result[0].task_deadline}

Order details

Other Information

{details.result[0].price_per_page}
Price:
{details.result[0].price}
Pages Number:
{details.result[0].pages}

Writer Details

{console.log(details.writerDetails)}

Order Files

{details.orderFiles.map((item,index)=>{ return })}
# File Name Action
{index +1} {item.filename} Download

Writer submited Files

# File Name Action
1 frank-bibliography puyao_Review_19-03-2018(0).docx Download
{isAccept &&
}
} } const style={ button:{ marginTop:"10px", marginRight:'10px', border:"0px", outline:"0px", height:"40px", width:"40px", borderRadius:"20px", border:"1px solid #ecff" } } export default SingeleTask;
